doc.field: Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Subseries I.A. Annual Seminar on Foreign and Religious Life for the Foreign Service Institute
Subseries I.A. Annual Seminar on Foreign and Religious Life for the Foreign Service Institute

This subseries contains ephemera from the annual seminar that Appeal of Conscience Foundation runs for the State Department's foreign service officers before the officers receive their overseas assignments. The seminar takes place at the Foreign Service Institute, or FSI, and the material in this subseries dates back to 1981. Material in this subseries includes: copies of lectures, photographs, correspondence, information packets, brochures, programs, articles, schedules, images, audio cassette tapes, VHS tapes, video recordings, and filled out questionnaires. There are some born-digital media--images and video--in this subseries.
